channel.title: Friends School on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Friends School on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: Latin Sux
item.description: I start school again. I am not as excited as i should be, cuz i got latin. I hate latin. Its too hard to be fun. i wish it were like “really advanced generic computer science that is too hard for everyone” becuase than i would have a chance to have fun. But nope… the final latin class calls my name. I also need to finish my symposium project.
